title: amco整合包1.23免安装版
author: 星辰の羽翼
txt_content:
使用了384509230 搬运的amco1.23安装包，通过zdwk223 帖子中提示的方法进行了修正 ，亲测能进入游戏 
内置mclauncher 4
需要java java7
以下为mod列表 外文苦手 翻译无力
另该整合包基本无汉化 英文苦手某表示无能为力
Mod Name. . . . . . . . Version. . Owner. . . . . . . . .Description
ChickenCodeCore. . . . .1.2.3. . . chicken_bones. . . . .Required by Chicken Bones mods
ModLoader MP. . . . . . 1.2.3 v3. .ScottyDoesKnow. . . . Required by other mods
Mod Loader. . . . . . . 1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Required by almost everything
Audio Mod. . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Allows new sounds to be added
Forge. . . . . . . . . .1.3.0. . . Eloram & Space Toad. .Required by other mods
Shelf. . . . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Display all the cool new items
Armor Stand. . . . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Display all the cool new armor
Light Sensor. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . On when light, off when dark
Portal Gun. . . . . . . 1.2.3 v1. .iChun. . . . . . . . .Like the game "Portal"
Equivalent Exchange. . .1.4.0.3. . x3n0ph0b3. . . . . . .Alchemy and power items
More Stackables. . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Increases stack limits
More Paintings. . . . . 1.2.3 v2. .Micomico. . . . . . . Richt-click to cycle paintings
More Fuel. . . . . . . .1.2.3 v1.8.Grom PE. . . . . . . .Burn more stuff
Starting Inventory. . . 1.2.3. . . DaftPVF / bspkrs. . . Start with stuff
In Game Info. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . DaftPVF / bspkrs. . . In-game information
Timber. . . . . . . . . 1.2.3. . . TehKrush. . . . . . . Cut down the whole tree
Crafting Guide. . . . . 1.4.3. . . Uristqwerty. . . . . .Shows how to build everything
Recipie Book. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Shows how to build everything
Crystal Wing. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . DaftPVF / bspkrs. . . Teleport back home
Tale of Kingdoms. . . . 1.3.0. . . TyberAlyx. . . . . . .Fight for your own Kingdom
Invasion. . . . . . . . 0.9.2. . . Lieu. . . . . . . . . Mobs try to destroy your base
32x32 Ore textures. . . n/a. . . . Wreckage. . . . . . . Textrues for new ores
other textures. . . . . n/a. . . . Misa. . . . . . . . . Other textures
Steampunk Textures. . . 1.1.0. . . Glimmar. . . . . . . .Steampunk Textures
Ender Chest. . . . . . .1.0.2. . . chicken_bones. . . . .Transdimensional storage device
Not Enough Items. . . . 1.1.3. . . chicken_bones. . . . .Inventory editor. Press <o>
Sign Tags. . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Display game varialbes on signs
Death Chest. . . . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Chests save stuff when you die.
Spawner GUI. . . . . . .1.2.3. . . Risugami. . . . . . . Right-Click spawners to change
Somnia. . . . . . . . . 1.2.3 v2.0.MALfunction84. . . . .World simulates while you sleep
Zeppelin. . . . . . . . 0.27. . . .blakmajik. . . . . . .Build a craft, and drive it away
MiniMap. . . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . ReiFNSK. . . . . . . .A Mini Map
Better Dungeons. . . . .0.923. . . Chocolatin. . . . . . Better and bigger too
BuildCraft. . . . . . . 3.1.4. . . SpaceToad . . . . . . Adds machienes to the game
Floating Ruins. . . . . 1.2.3. . . DaftPVF / bspkrs. . . Islands in the sky
Millénaire. . . . . . . 2.3.6. . . Kinniken. . . . . . . Adds villages and people
Fossils and Archeology. 1.2.3. . . Flammarilva. . . . . .Dinosaurs
Taller Doors. . . . . . 2.2. . . . ironclad49er. . . . . Taller Doors
Sponges. . . . . . . . .1.0. . . . ironclad49er. . . . . Soak up water, even lava
Neather Ores. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Ore in the Nether
Minecraft Minions. . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Mobs to do your bidding. Press <M>
RopePlus. . . . . . . . 1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Ropes and arrows. < > to change.
Battle Towers. . . . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Fight monsters by the floor.
Kenshiro Mod. . . . . . 1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Right-click without shirt
Stalker Creeper. . . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Makes Creepers more creepy
Ruins. . . . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . AtomicStryker. . . . .Adds structurs to the world
Better Enchanting. . . .1.2.6. . . xkyouchoux. . . . . . Pick your enchantments
Random Mobs. . . . . . .all. . . . Balthichou. . . . . . Not all mobs look the same
Inventory Tweeks. . . . 1.40b. . . jimeowan. . . . . . . Press R to sort inventory
Red Power 2. . . . . . .pre 4e. . .Eloraam. . . . . . . .Nes redstone circuits, ores, etc.
Industrial Craft 2. . . 1.81. . . .IC2 dev team. . . . . A whole new world of machienes
Simple Harvest Craft. . 1.06. . . .MatrexsVigil. . . . . Lots of new Farming
WeeFlowers. . . . . . . 1.9.9. . . MatrexsVigil. . . . . Adds more flowers
GUI API. . . . . . . . .1.2.3. . . ShaRose. . . . . . . .Required by 'Coral'
Coral Reefs. . . . . . .1.2.3. . . q3hardcore. . . . . . Adds coral reefs

另求高手汉化，同时发现115挂了 -- 囧 上传dbank中
就不设置隐藏了（不会用 ==
